discourse_list.title: NFT community Fund Mgmt EIP Consideration

content.content: A new EIP is drafted for reviews. The proposed EIP defines how the NFT community fund is running in the a community where NFT tokens are taken as ID Passes.
content.GPT-summary: The post introduces a new EIP proposal for the management of the NFT community fund, where NFT tokens are used as ID passes. The author is seeking feedback on the proposal, explaining its contents, and open to constructive criticism, questions, and reviews from third parties.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
